data.title: One of the best burgers in the Permian Basin
data.text: Great atmosphere and the architecture and decorations are really historic.  They emphasize the incredible petroleum history of Midland.  The blue cheese burger is delicious.  The drinks at good and I have not had a bad meal here.  Quality of all the meals have been superb.  You won't be disappointed.

owner_response.author: Jeri H, Public Relations Manager at Basin Burger House, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you so much for taking the time to give us such wonderful
 feedback. We strive to provide the best experience we can to every customer and pride ourselves on great tasting food. We spent a lot of time researching Midland's history to make the environment a true tribute to the Permian Basin and its history, so it means a lot to hear that you enjoyed it. Please come back and say hi again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great place for lunch
data.text:
Met my wife for lunch this week and food and service was outstanding.
Burgers were perfect...sweet potato fries were the highlight for me.
Maybe a little expensive for a burger but the food was great!

owner_response.author: Jeri H, Public Relations Manager at Basin Burger House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for taking time to give us feedback on your experience. We couldn't be happier to hear that the food and the service were outstanding! Please stop by again soon! Those sweet potato fries are calling your name.......
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best iced tea around!
data.text: Great burgers & the best iced tea around!!  Fast service.  Loved the mural on the wall as you walk in.

owner_response.author: Jeri H, Public Relations Manager at Basin Burger House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for your generous compliments! We pride ourselves on great food and awesome customer service, so we couldn't be happier that you experienced both! Stop by and say hi again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Sweet potatoe fries, but no shakes...
data.text:
Drove over here because the reviews on here said they had the best shakes.  Upon arrival discover they don't do shakes, so thanks idiot person on here reviewing with bad info.

On the flip side caught a half priced draft shiner and a giant order of sweet potatoe flies that were supurb.

Really nowhere near our area, but if I'm around this side again I'll drop in to try the burgers.

owner_response.author: Jeri H, Public Relations Manager at Basin Burger House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much for your feedback. So sorry you came for a shake and didn't find one. We used to serve shakes, but took them off our menu some time ago. But it sounds like all ended well and you got to enjoy some of our famous sweet potato fries! YUM! Thanks again and be sure to stop in and say hi if you're in the neighborhood again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent Upscale Burger House and more.
data.text: We went one Saturday about 11am and they were serving breakfast and lunch. They have just begun to serve breakfast. We got burgers but will go back for breakfast one day soon. Like the decor very much, it is an upscale dinner atmosphere. Burgers are a little pricey but they are worth it. Sweet potato fries are wonderful. Ill probably take my grown kids here for a family meal when they come to visit. Nice place with good service!

owner_response.author: Jeri H, Public Relations Manager at Basin Burger House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for your generous compliments! Most people don't take the time to post positive feedback for businesses and it's wonderful that you took the time to share your experience at Basin Burger House. We pride ourselves on serving amazing food and providing each customer with the best dining experience we can. Please stop by again soon and be sure to say hi!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Sunday Brunch
data.text: This was our first visit for Sunday Brunch. We have learned they now serve breakfast daily. They had a kids menu which was good since we had a child with us. The service and seating was quick, no editing. The brunch menu was good, I ordered the eggs ranchero and was disappointed when the food was cold not even warm enough to melt the cheese. The beans were actually cold like from the fridge. I sent the food back to ask that it be warned enough to melt my cheese. They do offer $5.00 off coupons on $20.00 purchase on local grocery receipts so look for those to save some money!

owner_response.author: Jeri H, Public Relations Manager at Basin Burger House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are sorry to hear that your food was cold. We pride ourselves on serving great tasting HOT food, so your feedback is very important to us. We are continually striving to improve. And thanks for rating us 4 stars despite your experience. Please stop by and give us another chance!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very good!
data.text: Very good food but a bit over priced for burgers! Love the fries. Wanted a salmon burger but they were out so I got Mexi burger. Ate half there and saved half. It was as good as it was at the place! Will be back!

owner_response.author: Jeri H, Public Relations Manager at Basin Burger House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: So glad to hear you enjoyed your burger and fries AND that you will be back to see us again! Thanks for your compliments!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: very good burgers
data.text: We visited Basin Burger on a Sunday.  They were serving their brunch menu, so we didn't get a chance to see their complete burger menu.  We ordered basic burgers.  The burgers were very good.  The fries were limp and cold.

owner_response.author: Jeri H, Public Relations Manager at Basin Burger House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your feedback. So glad your burgers were great! We strive to continually improve and will take your comment about the fries to heart. We want to serve piping hot food to every customer! Please stop by and give us another chance soon. Thanks again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Lunch
data.text: Busy lunch crowd so plan to go early .Burgers are excellent and I enjoy the sweet potatoe fries, pork chop and mashed potatoes is a good choice if have a bigger appetite .

data.title: Not my choice for a Sunday Brunch
data.text:
Four of us decided to try Basin Burger for Sunday Brunch.  At the end of the meal, we all 4 had the same impression.  Not coming back.  Although the atmosphere is really nice and the place is clean, the food and service just doesn't compete with other choices.
My first test of any waiter/waitress is when I order my water.  I specifically ask for water and NO ICE.  If they are really listening to (me) their customer, then I get no ice but that only happens about 30-40% of the time.  Yep, I got the usual ice water here.
Among the 4 of us, the common observation was:
1.  The food was barely warm when served.
2.  The potatoes were swimming in grease.
3.  The bacon was raw.
4.  The menu is very limited and if you are looking for a serving that will feed something less than an army, you are out of luck.
5.  Nothing special like eggs benedict, so if that's what you want, go to Wall Street or The Bar.
6.  Once the food arrived, the waiter went AWOL.  I had to go find some hot sauce for our table.
7.  Knowing math or how to use a calculator isn't a requirement of employment.  We asked to split the ticket 50/50 between us two couples.  The checks were over 3 dollars difference and the waiter simply said that it was as close to a split as he could get.  Really?  As close as you can get is like a cent or two.  Maybe "X" divided by 2 is asking too much.
8.  For the price, service, food quality and menu options we won't be back.

data.title: FRESH OFF THE GRILL!!!!
data.text: Gotta try this place. Awesome food. Wonderful atmosphere. Clean. Friendly employees. Venture out and try new things from the menu.

data.title: Breakfast not so good.
data.text: Decided to try the breakfast. The concept is great, but the execution is a bit off. the eggs are a little dry, but the bacon is nice and crispy without being crunchy. The potatoes are outstanding, Just a touch of garlic to accent them. Overall a tad bit expensive for just a breakfast.

data.title: Variety of burgers, plus other options
data.text: Great burgers, great service. Very popular for lunch. They do a great Sunday brunch with a lot of options. The burgers are definitely a full meal!!!

data.title: Great Burger
data.text: Went and ordered to go at the bar.  Bartender was great.  Quick with drinks and order.  Didn't take long at all to get burgers. The were very good.  Best I have had in a while.

data.title: Beers and Burgers
data.text: I was really impressed with this place. The restaurant is huge with seating inside and outside. I went on a Thursday and they had live music which was just right. (not overly loud) They have a full bar. I got a tall blue moon and it was def tall!! our wait staff was very responsive and our food was out quick. Its good for families or a meet up with friends. I had the Salmon burger and the cloeslaw ontop was very good. I was a lil disappointed in the sweet potato fries. They were not right out of the fryer might have set for a bit.

data.title: Best Burger in Midland
data.text: Excellent place for a burger and salad. Of the burgers I've had in Midland, this is hands down the best. Juicy, cooked just the way you want it with the toppings you want. Excellent choice of sides. Comfortable place with excellent food.

data.title: A little over priced and food takes a long time
data.text: The food at Basin Burger is decent, however, you ALWAYS have a long wait time. Usually if I go during lunch, I'm late getting back to work, and at dinner, it takes even longer. Over all, food is pretty decent.

data.title: Lunch Time Burger with Family
data.text: While visiting Midland, our son suggested that we join him for lunch at the Basin Burger House.  We enjoyed the place.  The food was excellent and our server who just had started did a great job.  Our son had to get back to work and I spent extra time looking at the old pictures and taking in some of that Texas history.

data.title: Best Flavor Ever!!!
data.text: Such an amazing accommodating staff.  This establishment actually has a chef!!  Establishment is open and airy with industrial flair and glass garage doors which open and close with your request.

data.title: Dryer Than the Texas Sand
data.text:
Went to Basin Burger Friday night.  I ordered the burger with chili, cheese and jalapenos and still it was dryer than the Texas sand.  Way overcooked.  The menu says medium.  Way past.  My wife and son who like their beef burnt beyond recognition liked this place

Fries, both sweet potato and regular are good.  The setting and service were fine.
